snippet: Artificial wave pools eliminate surfing’s guesswork and waiting, which is their virtue — and their biggest drawback....
abstract: Surfer Diane Cardwell describes riding artificial wave at NLand Surf Park in Austin, Tex.
lead_paragraph: Artificial wave pools eliminate surfing’s guesswork and waiting, which is their virtue — and their biggest drawback.

headline.main: First-Person Surfer: My Test Drive of Artificial Waves
headline.print_headline: Waves, and Little Else, in an Artificial Lagoon
